str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Peter, a Greek name meaning rock. Apparently a primary word; a rock; as a name, Petrus, an apostle.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To begin. Middle voice of archo; to commence.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From ek and tithemi; to expose; figuratively, to declare.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From kata and hexes; thereafter, i.e. Consecutively; as a noun a subsequent person or time.
